    • Constructor Detail

      • Porte

        public Porte​(int direction,
             int cat)
        Create a door
        Parameters:
        direction - is an int representing the door's direction, 1 is for going north 2 is for going south 3 is for going east and 4 is for going east
        cat - is an int representing the door's state : 0 is unlocked 2 is locked by a key

      • Porte

        public Porte​(int direction)
        Create an unlocked door
        Parameters:
        direction - is an int representing the door's direction, 1 is for going north 2 is for going south 3 is for going east and 4 is for going east

      • Porte

        public Porte​(int direction,
             Enigme enigme)
        Create a door locked by an enigma
        Parameters:
        direction - is an int representing the door's direction, 1 is for going north 2 is for going south 3 is for going east and 4 is for going east
        enigme - is the enigma attached to the door

      • unlock

        public boolean unlock​(Key key)
        Unlocks a door using a key
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the door is unlocked false if it's locked

      • unlock

        public void unlock​(Enigme enigme)
            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Unlocks the door by resolving the enigma
        Parameters:
        enigme - is the enigma you want to launch
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - to avoid errors (It should never get into this exception)
